name: ATG: All Terrain Gardener
overview: A platformer created by Dave Korn and Paul Docherty (who did the graphics) as well as Gwynfor Davies & Alessandro DeLucia (who worked on SFX and music) and was to be published by Firebird shortly before they were sold to MicroProse, but was eventually released in Commodore Zone #15, which was a digital only release.
